nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i2
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He reached the airport in time.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i3
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The young marine sat by the old man the whole night.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The young marine sat by the old man the whole night.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i5
